attributes.action: Reducing trading hr in Harrods(11am to 7pm) that’s insane! Store must be closed
attributes.additional_details: We are completely scared about this situation! The whole world has taken action. We too want our rights, we are human and we are one!
attributes.background: it is not a right decision to reduce working hours, it is not a decision related to our and our customers health . Once again it is a decision made for the business, because the entire store is empty and therefore it’s your convenience to open and close earlier.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that make accusations about the behaviour of a particular company.

Since you started your petition the Government has announced that all shops selling non-essential goods should close: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/pm-address-to-the-nation-on-coronavirus-23-march-2020

Harrods has announced that its store will be closing its store from Wednesday 25 March: https://www.harrods.com/en-gb/faqs/covid-19-statement

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
